meta.description: Minimize the rental fees for warehouse space over a 4-month period with varying contract lengths and discounts.

sets.name: MONTHS
sets.description: Months for which warehouse space is required

params.name: required_area
params.description: Required warehouse area for each month in m^2

params.name: rental_fee
params.description: Rental fee per m^2 for each contract period

vars.name: x
vars.description: Area rented in m^2 starting in each month for each contract period

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(x[m][p] * rental_fee[p] for m in MONTHS for p in PERIODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total rental cost over all months and contract periods

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_1
constraints.description: Ensure the required area is met for month 1

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['2'][p] + (x['1'][p] if p >= 2 else 0) for p in PERIODS)
constraints.description: Ensure the required area is met for month 2

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['3'][p] + (x['2'][p] if p >= 2 else 0) + (x['1'][p] if p >= 3 else 0) for p in PERIODS)
constraints.description: Ensure the required area is met for month 3

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['4'][p] + (x['3'][p] if p >= 2 else 0) + (x['2'][p] if p >= 3 else 0) + (x['1'][p] if p == 4 else 0) for p in PERIODS)
constraints.description: Ensure the required area is met for month 4
